tool_description: Converts air quality measures.  PM2.5 to US AQI. US AQI to PM2.5.
name: Air Quality Converter
title: Air Quality Converter

api_list.name: AQItable
api_list.description: HTML full gradient reference table AQI / PM2.5
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://air-quality-converter.p.rapidapi.com/AQItable"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "air-quality-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://air-quality-converter.p.rapidapi.com/AQItable"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "air-quality-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: PM25toUSAQI
api_list.description:
Converts PM2.5 exposure value in µg/m³ to its corresponding value on the US AQI scale (U.S. Air Quality Index, https://www.airnow.gov/aqi/aqi-basics/)

With official description and color codes.

api_list.name: USAQItoPM25
api_list.description:
Converts US AQI (U.S. Air Quality Index, https://www.airnow.gov/aqi/aqi-basics/) value to its corresponding PM2.5 exposure value in µg/m³.

With official description and color codes.
